title: Use cases
pageDescription: VK Cloud provides tools and software packages for implementing a variety of tasks facing system administrators: from using basic services to high-load environments and landscapes. Experienced experts share the most interesting ways to deploy the services necessary to implement the tasks.
shortDescription: Installing LAMP, FAMP, ELK, Docker CE on CentOS, Ubuntu and other Linux-based operating systems
metaDescription: VK Cloud provides tools and software packages to implement a variety of tasks facing system administrators.
markdown: VK Cloud provides tools and software packages for implementing a variety of tasks facing system administrators: from using basic services to high-load environments and landscapes. Experienced experts share the most interesting ways to deploy the services necessary to implement the tasks.
